name: matrix-rageshake-crisp
description: This script searches for conversations on the Crisp API with the state 'pending' and metadata 'email' set to a specific value.

CRISP_WEBSITE_ID.description: The ID of the Crisp website to search for conversations

RAGESHAKE_EMAIL.description: The email address to search for in the conversations' metadata.

DRY_RUN.description: Set to `True` if you don't want any change to append.

SCHEDULE_CRISP_INVALID_RAGESHAKE.description: CRON schedule for the job job_process_invalid_rageshake in seconds

SCHEDULE_JOB_SLEEPY_CONVERSATION_IN_HOUR.description: CRON schedule for the job job_process_sleepy_conversations in hours

SCHEDULE_JOB_EXPORT_SEGMENTS_IN_DAYS.description: CRON schedule for the job job_export_crips_conversation_segments_s3 in days

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: S3 bucket name where to export the crisp segments

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: S3 ACCESS_KEY_ID name where to export the crisp segments

S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: S3 SECRET_ACCESS_KEY name where to export the crisp segments
